events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department focused on software development roles.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the software engineer recruitment process.
The initial screening interview focused on your previous engineering experience and software development skills went very well.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions; it helps us move your application forward smoothly.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the engineering position on April 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You completed the technical interview with strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities that impressed the panel.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, with a good discussion about your values and alignment with our workplace culture.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback and enthusiasm about the offer and joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer to join us as a software engineer, and we are excited to have you onboard.
Your onboarding process has begun with all necessary training sessions and introduction to the engineering team.
The hiring process for the software engineer role is now closed with your successful integration into the team.
